rama kumaru wishnuge hayawani awatharaya bawa ramayanaye sadahanya.sitha oopapathikawa (mawaka ha piyeku nathiwa) nangul miten ipaduni.lakshmana dasaratha rajuge putheku pamani.hanuman wandureki.rama ha lakshmana sarangu gangata pana diwi nasagathi.sitha polowa palunu wiwarayata pana diwi nasagathi.sithage daruwan wu lawa ha kusa gana ramayana kathru kiyathudu oopapathika gahaniyakata daruwan lada nohaka.ayada rama menma awathaayak ho mayawak pamanak wiya haka.dath depa ha walgaya sahitha hanuman gana katha kala yuthu natha.ebawin manushya bawa ha aithihasika bawa sanathawana rawana gnyathi piris gana simitha thorathuru pahatha dakwe.
